title: 14 day ban for being flamed and reported

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: So i get banned for going 6/17/17 for "intentionally feeding" in a normal game in which I won and had the most honors on the team... okay, maybe you should ban the friggin pantheon that actually did intentionally feed that game. Not to mention flamed me! I've been having a series of bad games, doesn't mean I'm inting it means that's why I'm playing normals gawd! thanks for rewarding the douchebags who constantly verbally abuse me though!

replies.body: I went ahead and pulled up those chat logs for you to see just what went down in that match. While the other panth might have been feeding, it looks like some of the things said by you in that match weren't all quite positive either which could have led to those reports.
